channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @rrhoover S&P 500, because it's pretty much guaranteed to go up over time, because politicians are judged on its performance.
@judell @nathanwallace @steampipeio Okay thanks, I think I understand now. This approach can only look in a single feed, the feed is the database.
@claco or "slaves"

1/5 I think a lot of people on Twitter argue for fame. They want to be famous for having an idea first, whether or not they did have it first. I don't think I do that. I like setting precedent in software. But even there, I have a motto -- "Only steal from the best." My goal is
2/5 to find ways to work with others so that the sum is greater than the parts. I think that's the challenge of our generation and all subsequent generations. We're not dealing with climate change, for example. We're losing our minds as a country in other ways, for example the
3/5 decision the Supreme Court is contemplating. You know it's not going to work, it'll be as big a disaster as climate change, but we'll feel it right away. We can't connect enough so that the people who we've supposedly trusted for being wise to avoid jumping unnecessarily,
4/5 with no possible gain, into an abyss that will certainly lead to war. It's that big a deal. At age 67, I don't have the same goals I had at 22. I'm not trying to set the world on fire, I'm trying nudge people into working with each other, even today's 22 year-olds. We should
5/5 be giving out Nobel Prizes to people who find ways to work with others. That's the challenge for the human species, from now on, imho of course.

@spectrumfox @TaylorLorenz The only way it can happen is if one of the companies in the coalition becomes the next Facebook or TikTok, and if they stick to their commitment, which I expect they wouldnâ€™t. The only way it can work is if the member data is stored elsewhere, from the start.

@moverted @TaylorLorenz Thatâ€™s really the only way it can work. Also, I went to their site and didnâ€™t see any information about their proposal, and Iâ€™m not cool with it only being VC backed companies, because thatâ€™s where the lock-in and lack of reciprocity comes from.

Summer up. Long outdoor bike ride today followed by swimming. We made it! Winter is over.
